name: Gravity Kid
description:
Use the powers of gravity to guide the Kid through 30 stages of gravity-switching action and survive the fiendish traps and monsters of the labyrinth.

  • 30 stages of gravity-bending puzzle-action!
  • Pure 1-bit graphics at a staggering 48p resolution!
  • Authentic keypad-only controls!
  • True mono sound!

Made for the Nokia 3310 Game Jam.


CONTROLS

ACTION INPUTS Confirm / Pause [ Num0 ] [ Enter ] [ Space ] Up [ Num8 ] [ Up ] [ W ] Down [ Num5 ] [ Down ] [ S ] Left [ Num4 ] [ Left ] [ A ] Right [ Num6 ] [ Right ] [ D ] Reset [ Num'*' ] [ R ] ---

HOTKEYS / SETTING

ACTION INPUT Palette Switch [ F1 ] Audio On/Off [ F2 ] Frame Limit [ F3 ]

CREDITS

Efforts Pro Font by somepx

Nokia 3310 Sound Pack by Trix

https://phillipp.itch.io/nokiajamresources
